id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [gp8403 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/gp8403.html#component-hub)*

voltage.docs:
**voltage**: The output voltage range of the DAC. Must be one of `5V` or `10V`.

*See also: [gp8403 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/gp8403.html#component-hub)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [gp8403 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/gp8403.html#output)*

gp8403_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the GP8403 component. Defaults to the only GP8403 component if there is only one.

*See also: [gp8403 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/gp8403.html#output)*

channel.docs:
**int**: The channel of the GP8403 to use. Must be `0` or `1`.

*See also: [gp8403 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/gp8403.html#output)*
